title: The Scattered King
description: The ninth is awake and has broken the gate,A shadow of anger, a nightmare of hate.The world will end once its errand is done,To gather the nine and re-forge the one.Gilliath, The Maker, has been betrayed by his fellow gods, his soul carved into nine fragments and scattered across the world. The most potent part of his soul has been sent through the Nine Fold Gate to the realm of death, and all to prevent his ever returning to unmake the world he created.But now the Ninefold Gate is broken, and Gilliath has returned and is seeking the scattered parts of his soul. And the terrified gods who betrayed him.Brennus, a retired soldier turned innkeeper, is unwillingly recruited by the Carrion Queen, the Goddess of Death herself, to find Gilliath and prevent his resurrection. A task made all the more perilous because Gilliath can take possession of anyone. Brennus and his friends find themselves in a desperate fight for survival, and some will fall.Snee, former captain of the night guard of T’eag , finds her past returns to haunt her through the words of a false prophet who knows far too much about her deepest secrets. She must fight to save not only herself but her oldest friends from the vengeance of a monster she thought she had escaped long ago. And though she does not know it, one of those friends holds the secret to the location of all of the scattered parts of Gilliath’s soul.Iordanis, elf assassin to Bera, Goddess of the Wild, is sent into the human world to finish a task she failed years earlier. She finds herself fighting alongside people she has considered enemies for all her life against demons from the deepest reaches of the earth.Though at first their trials seem isolated, it soon becomes clear that their lives and the dangers they face are just the first tremors of a cataclysmic battle for the survival of their world.Set in a vast and dynamic world of gods and magic, this epic fantasy is perfect for fans of Lord of the Rings, Wheel of Time and Game of Thrones.
author: Michael S.  Evans
